header.title: Get to know Cartagena, La Heroica.

destino1.title: The #1 tourist destination
destino1.content: The best tourist destination in Colombia, for its white sand beaches, colonial streets and a wide range of experiences that will make you feel in a paradise on the shores of the Caribbean.

destino2.title: Cartagena, culture and pure history, a recipe that heals and renews,
destino2.titleSpan: do you dare to try it?
destino2.content: Come and enjoy the magic of La Fant√°stica, experience the privileges of a modern city and the mysticism of the colonial era.
